page.title: 17VILLAGE SHOP AND INN
page.content:
{Langtree Post Office}is run by my parents, Mr & Mrs J. Pollard. The building is thought to be 500 years old. There are two postal collections each day (exept Sunday). In the shop we sell mostly food. We also sell stationery, toys, sweets, drinks,polish, games, models, clothing, seeds, light bulbs, fruit and vegetables. We sell a lot of cat and dog food. The shop is open every day except Sunday.
{The Green Dragon Inn}was first licensed in 1728. The beech tree outside was damaged by fire in 1924 and is a local landmark. The present landlords are Mr.B.A. and Mrs.M.V.Bindloss.
